attributes.action: invest the tax gained from Petrol and Diesel at the forecourts, into car technology to reduce and eradicate emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Petition asks the Government to use the money gained from the tax on fuel at the forecourts to improve the technology in motor cars to reduce and finally eradicate fuel emissions.

An increase in fuel, has been linked to our behaviour in driving, and thus why the Government does not reduce fuel tax, and yet they will not invest in green technology.
